v-model.description: Selected arrow direction: 1 ascending, 0 resetting state, -1 descending.
v-model.description_zh: 选中的箭头方向：1 升序，0 重置状态，-1 降序。

title.description: Sort the copy displayed by the button.

allow-reset.description: When the double arrows are displayed, the button is allowed to be reset manually.
allow-reset.description_zh: 展示双箭头时，允许手动重置按钮。

desc-first.description: The priority switch is changed to descending order, and if it is not enabled, the priority switch is changed to ascending order by default
desc-first.description_zh: 优先切换为降序，不开启则默认优先切换为升序

line.description: Underlines are displayed, and when there is only one sort button, the underlines should not be displayed
line.description_zh: 展示下划线，当只有一个排序按钮时，应该不展示下划线

events.name: change
events.description: Listen to the order of the listener to be modified
